content: 4mm hook 8ply/dk yarn in various colours i have used three colour pallets for this temperature blanket high low = 14 colours ranging from -1 to 40+ deg c 3deg increments rainfall = 5 shades of brown or greys ranging from cream to chocolate no rain 1-7mm 8-14mm 15-21mm 22+ month = 12 colours or you could do 4 seasons each motif measures approximately 3 5 inch 9cm amount of yarn required will vary for different regions you will need more for middle of the range temperatures and less for extreme temperatures instructions for borders are not included
